Attention: Citation 560 Owners Upgrade your MST 67A transponder to the MST 70B ADS-B and get a $50,000 discount on the AeroVue Integrated Flight Deck when it becomes available for the Citation 560 in late 2019.* MST 70B The BendixKing MST 70B retrofit is the quickest way to upgrade your MST 67A transponder equipped aircraft to be compliant with global ADS-B Out mandates. It brings new capabilities to your current traffic and surveillance system with a transition to ADS-B Out. AeroVue Integrated Flight Display BendixKing’s AeroVue is a complete avionics retrofit flight deck solution for Citation 560 owners and operators, and is expected to be certified on the Citation 560 platform by the end of 2019. Don’t delay, as this promotion ends September 30, 2019.
CLICK HERE FOR MORE INFORMATION <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/MST-70B.html]]>
